enchantment.livingenchantment.enchantmen: Gives life to the enchanted item, enabling it to grow stronger with use!
commands.livingenchantment.mainhand_item: To use this command, you must have a Living enchanted item held in your main hand.
commands.livingenchantment.invalid_xp_nu: 經驗值必須是非負數。它可以是一個小數。
commands.additemxp.success: 已將 %f 經驗值加到物品 "%s".
commands.setitemxp.success: 將 "%s" 的經驗值設定為 %s。
commands.setitemlevel.invalid_level_numb: 等級必須是小於 %s（最大等級）的非負整體數字。
commands.setpersonality.not_in_range: "%s" is not a recognized personality. Specified personality must be a number greater than zero and less than or equal to 1, or the name of the personality.
_comment_4: Attack Damage as it appears in your minecraft language
text.new_update_notification: 有一個可用的 %s 更新
